trans-unit.source: Enables or disables file system redirection for the calling thread

target.mrk: Enables or disables file system redirection for the calling thread

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether enable or disable the WOW64 system folder redirection, valid values:

trans-unit.source: This function is useful for 32-bit applications that want to gain access to the native system32 directory.

seg-source.mrk: This function is useful for 32-bit applications that want to gain access to the native system32 directory.

target.mrk: This function is useful for 32-bit applications that want to gain access to the native system32 directory.

trans-unit.source: By default, WOW64 file system redirection is enabled.

seg-source.mrk: By default, WOW64 file system redirection is enabled.

target.mrk: By default, WOW64 file system redirection is enabled.

trans-unit.source: This function may not work reliably when there are nested calls.

seg-source.mrk: This function may not work reliably when there are nested calls.

target.mrk: This function may not work reliably when there are nested calls.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this function has been replaced
